lead_paragraph: In his first competition since completing a one-year doping suspension, Zach Lund won yesterday’s race at the national skeleton team trials series in Park City, Utah. He finished his two runs with a combined time of 1 minute 39.70 seconds, about a half-second faster than the runner-up, Chris Hedquist.
